chemicals_used.DMF: 10 mL for initial mixture, 5 mL for dissolving H4ETTC and BA

synthesis_conditions.time: Ultrasounded for 10 min, heated for 2 h at 85 °C, then 5 days at 120 °C
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Soaked in acetone for three days, dried at 50 °C for half an hour

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with DMF (10 × 2 mL) and acetone (5 × 2 mL)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Recovery of LIFM-66W from LIFM-66Y was accomplished upon heating in the presence of BA at 100 °C for 48 h.
